name: Cosmic Warfare
description:
Cosmic Warfare is a short STR game prototype i made as a personnal project. I'm a huge fan of STR games, so i tried to create one in Unity. The game is actually simple, you can build some buildings and command some units in order to fight a simple AI, which will send you enemies periodically, in one level.

Every asset in the game can be found in the Asset Store.

How to play :
  • Hold right click to move the camera.
  • Use the middle click to rotate the camera and zoom. 
  • Use the left click to select units.
  • Use right click to move them, use right click on enemy units to attack them.
  • To build, select a building by clicking on a button on the right panel, and choose a flat position on the terrain. 
  • You can only build in a limited range around your main base.
  • Build engines to gain resources. Engines can be builded only on snowy surfaces.
  • Destroy the enemy's base to win the game.
